author: Buying Business Travel
title: BBC retains American Express as TMC
text:
BBC retains American Express as TMC 0 comments 
The BBC has retained American Express Global Business Travel as its business travel provider. 
American Express has been working with the broadcasting giant as its TMC for more than 11 years. 
Elyes Mrad, American Express GBT’s managing director, EMEA , said: “We continue to invest in technology and solutions that allow us to respond to the specific requirements of our clients and, as in the case of the BBC, deliver innovative solutions that help them manage their spend on air travel. 
“We are also thrilled that the high level service we provide to the BBC has recently been publicly recognised.” 
The contract with the BBC will see American Express GBT provide travel bookings, online booking technology, 24-hour client support and management information.
